column2: "Na ɔbanyin bi fi Levi fie kɔwaar Levi babaa bi."
"Na ɔbaa no nyinsenii
column3: na ɔwoo ɔbabanyin: na ohun dɛ ɔyɛ abofra a no ho yɛ fɛw no

column2: "Na ɔdze no suma bio a ɔnnyɛ yie no
column3: ɔfaa mbɛw adakaba
column4: na ɔdze hua na aman seraam ho: na ɔdze abofra no too mu
column5: na ɔdze kesii atsen  no mu wɔ esutsen no no nkɔkɔnoa."

column2: "Na n’akyerɛbaa gyinaa ekyirekyir
column3: dɛ ɔrohwɛ dza ɔbɛyɛ no."

column2: "Na Farao ne babaa sianee baa esutsen no ho dɛ oruboguar; na ne mbaawa pasaar esutsen no nkyɛn. Ber a ohun adaka no wɔ atsen no mu no
column3: ɔsomaa n’abaawa dɛ ɔnkɛfa mbra."

column2: "Na obuee do
column3: na ohun abofra no: na
column5: akɔkowaba no sui. Na ohun no mbɔbɔr
column7: Hebriwfo mba no kor nye yi."

column2: "Nna abofra no n’akyerɛbaa no bisaa Farao babaa no dɛ
column3: Ana monkɔ nkɛfrɛ Hebriwfo mbaa no mu onufomafo mbrɛ wo
column4: ma ɔmma abofra no enumfo mma wo anaa?"

column2: "Na Farao ne babaa no see no dɛ
column3: Kɔ. Na akataasia no kɔree kɛfrɛɛ abofra no ne na."

column2: "Na Farao ne babaa no see no dɛ
column3: Fa abofra yi kɔ
column4: na kɛma no enumfo ma me
column5: na medze w’akatua bɛma wo. Na ɔbaa no faa abofra no

column2: "Na abofra no nyinii
column3: na ɔdze no brɛɛ Farao ne babaa no
column4: na ɔbɛyɛɛ ne babanyin. Na ɔtoo no dzin Moses

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda no mu no
column3: aber a Moses nyinii no
column4: ofiir edzi kɔr no nuanom nkyɛn
column5: na ɔkɔhwɛɛ hɔn ndzesoadze. Ohun dɛ Egyptnyi bi robor Hebriwnyi bi

column2: "Na ɔhwɛɛ ha hwɛɛ ha
column3: na ohun dɛ nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ no
column5: na ɔdze no hyɛɛ anhwea mu."

column2: "Na n’adzekyee no ofiir edzi
column3: na
column5: Hebriwfo beenu roko: na obisaa nyia odzi fɔ no dɛ
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebɔ wo nyɛnko yi?"

column2: "Na obuaa no dɛ
column3: Woana yɛɛ wo ɔpanyin nye ɔsɛndzifo wɔ hɛn do? Edwen dɛ iruboku me dɛ mbrɛ ikum Egyptnyi no anaa? Na Moses suroi

column2: "Ber a Farao tsee asɛm yi no
column3: ɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ oboku Moses. Na Moses guanee fii Farao enyim
column4: na ɔkɛtsenaa Midian asaase do: na ɔkɔkoo nsubura bi ho."

column2: "Nna Midian ɔsɔfo no wɔ mbabaa beesuon; na wɔbae bɔtoow nsu
column3: na wɔdze hyehyɛɛ ndaasee no amaama dɛ wɔrema hɔn egya no nguan anom."

column2: "Na nguanhwɛfo bi bae beyii hɔn edzi: na Moses soɛree boaa hɔn
column3: na ɔmaa hɔn nguan no nomee."

column2: "Na wɔbaa hɔn egya Reuel nkyɛn no
column3: obisaa hɔn dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn na ndɛ hom aba ntsɛm dɛm yi?"

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Egyptnyi bi na oyii hɛn fii nguanhwɛfo no nsamu
column4: na ɔtoow nsu mpo maa hɛn

column2: "Na obisaa ne mbabaa no dɛ
column3: Na ɔwɔ hen? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom adan ɔbanyin no egya yi? Wɔnkɛfrɛ no ma ombedzidzi."

column2: "Na Moses peen dɛ ɔnye ɔbanyin no bɛtsena: na ɔpanyin no dze ne babaa Zipora maa Moses awar."
"Na ɔwoo ɔbabanyin
column3: na ɔtoo no dzin Gersom: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ mayɛ ɔmamforanyi wɔ ananaben asaase do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii guu mu no
column3: Egypthen no wui: na nkowaasom no ntsi Israelmba pempenee
column5: na hɔn su fowee kɔr Nyankopɔn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn tsee hɔn nkrumsi
column3: na Nyankopɔn kaa n’ahyɛmu a ɔnye Abraham

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn hwɛɛ Israelmba no
column3: na ohun hɔn haw."
